resources.string:
Hi There. 

My name is Simran and i love reading comics, novels and story books. 

I like reading them during my free time at home. 

When im all alone by myself at home, i like to curl up on my bed in my room and occupy myself with a good book. 

Fun fact, i fall asleep fast when i read books before bed and i always end up having a good night rest. 

I personally feel like people who have bad eye sight should do this more to improve their eyesight. 

That is the end of my biography. I hope you enjoy reading it.
